Name: Pirate Story
About the game: 'Pirate Story' is a hardcore 2D platformer about the misadventures of a brave Pirate. On his way to the treasure, he can't be stopped by dangerous traps, nor cannon balls! This game allows the player to experience the hardships of life as a pirate on their own skin. In an attempt to get to the next treasure map, you will have to pass the precipices, sharp spikes and infernal cannons that will shoot at you with balls. Only a brave and confident pirate will be able to reach the last level and collect all the cards Game Features: Old-school gameplay with increasing difficulty Soundtrack by Ozzed Steam Achievements support Nice pixel art graphics
